message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.NE, cs.AI, cs.RO

The paper proposes a neural network architecture for lifelong learning in complex environments, specifically for continuous object recognition. This suggests that the paper could belong to several arXiv CS sub-categories, including cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition), cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.RO (Robotics). The focus on spatiotemporal representations and the use of recurrent networks also suggest a strong connection to these sub-categories. Among these, cs.LG and cs.CV are the most likely categories, as they are the most directly related to the problem of lifelong learning in visual environments.
